title: The Intelligent Investor
author: Benjamin Graham
description: The definitive book on value investing, teaching discipline, risk control, and long-term thinking.

title: Common Stocks and Uncommon Profits
author: Philip A. Fisher
description: A deep dive into qualitative analysis and long-term growth investing.

title: A Random Walk Down Wall Street
author: Burton G. Malkiel
description: Explains efficient markets, index investing, and why beating the market is hard.

title: One Up On Wall Street
author: Peter Lynch
description: How individual investors can find winning stocks before Wall Street does.

title: The Little Book of Common Sense Investing
author: John C. Bogle
description: A strong case for low-cost index fund investing and long-term discipline.

title: Market Wizards
author: Jack D. Schwager
description: Interviews with top traders revealing psychology, risk, and strategy.

title: The Psychology of Money
author: Morgan Housel
description: How behavior, not intelligence, determines financial success.

title: Trading in the Zone
author: Mark Douglas
description: A classic on trading mindset, probabilities, and emotional discipline.

title: Security Analysis
author: Benjamin Graham & David Dodd
description: The foundational textbook for professional value investors.

title: The Man Who Solved the Market: How Jim Simons Launched the Quant Revolution
author: Gregory Zuckerman
description: The unbelievable story of a secretive mathematician who pioneered the era of the algorithmâ€“and made $23 billion doing it..
